title: Inflation rate in Nicaragua 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.

The line rapidly increased by 304.39% from Year 1984 to 1985,increased by 1380.96% from Year 1986 to 1987,decreased by 96.12% from Year 1990 to 1991,decreased by 81.22% from Year 1991 to 1992,decreased by 72.59% from Year 1993 to 1994,increased by 200.54% from Year 1994 to 1995,increased by 78.17% from Year 2007 to 2008, and lastly, decreased by 81.39% from Year 2008 to 2009.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1986 and 1987.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 13109.5 was reported at Year 1987
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 3.52 was reported at Year 2016
